Speaker: ﻿Sonya Blade
Text: As you were. For twenty-five years, the Special Forces have been Earthrealm’s sword and shield. We’ve pushed back Shao Kahn. Defeated Shinnok. Yet none of our Victories have come without cost. Recently, Commander Jackson Briggs was honorably discharged. His wounds, both physical and psychological, left him no longer fit to serve. We honor Jacqui’s father, and we honor his sacrifice, by doing what he would do -- tirelessly defend Earthrealm. Sergeant Cage, step forward. Your leadership and warfighting ability have earned you promotion to Commander. But there are no family favors here. By Special Forces tradition, you have to pass one last test.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I need to kick the CO’s ass, ma’am. Your ass, ma'am.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: All right then, Sergeant. Let’s see if you can take me.
[CASSIE CAGE VS SONYA BLADE]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Commander Cage, reporting for duty.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Congratulations, Commander.
[Johnny Cage approaches. He hugs Cassie.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: C’mon, dad. You really have to go?

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: You’ve got your duty, ‘Commander’. I’ve got mine.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Starring in yet another Ninja Mime sequel isn’t what I’d call duty.

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: I need to provide for you in the manner to which you've become accustomed.
[They kiss.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Geez guys. I’m right here.
[Suddenly Evil Raiden appears.]

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: General Blade. Cassandra Cage.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: What is it Raiden?

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: The Netherrealm.
[They go to the headquarters.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: We should open a dialogue. Maybe there’s an explanation. Liu Kang and Kitana were friends once.

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: They are irreparably polluted by Shinnok’s evil. They are no longer the champions we once knew We must strike them preemptively.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: It's about time we brought the fight to them. What’s the target?

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: Burned deep beneath Liu Kang and Kitana’s castle is the Cathedral of Shinnok, the seat of their power. Destroy it and their undead army will fall, removing its threat to Earthrealm.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Aren't your powers weaker in the Netherrealm?

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: Yes. But I will have sufficient strength to occupy the undead army.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: That'll buy us enough time to infiltrate the Cathedral. Destroy it from the inside.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: We get pinned down in there, there’s no way out.

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: To ensure Earthrealm's survival, we must all be willing to sacrifice.

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Y'know it's been two years too much of your grim and gritty makeover, droning on about sacrifice. You don’t have a family to lose.

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: I know loss, Johnny Cage.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Raiden’s right, Johnny. We're not ready for another war. We’ve got to take out Netherrealm’s army now, before Liu Kang can bring it here.
[Evil Raiden teleports Sonya, Cassie and her army to battle against armies of demons.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: We’re in position. Hope Raiden’s planned one helluva diversion.

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: Withdraw! Or feel the wrath of Earthrealm’s Protector!

[He uses Shinnok’s amulet and destroys several creatures. Meanwhile, resurrected Liu Kang and Kitana are watching the battle from a tower nearby. They sent reinforcements – Kabal and Jade along with fresh demons meat to beat.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Should Raiden get this far, eliminate him.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: That burn victim's Kabal? Wasn’t he Kano’s goon back in the day?

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Don’t let the scars fool you. He’s fast. Take out him and Jade. I’ll go downstairs and set the C4.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Roger that.

[They begin a massive attack on the tower. Surprisingly soldiers using the battle formation and tactics, so they don’t die very often. Rain enters the battle, fast as the wind. He kills one of the soldiers.]

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Move! Charges on every column!

Speaker: Kabal (to Cassie)
Text: You're a dead ringer for your mother.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I'll kick your ass on her behalf, Kabal.
[CASSIE CAGE VS KABAL]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: You lose as fast as you run. Jacqui, where's Jade?

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: She bailed. Getting help, I'm sure.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: General, how we doing?

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Need ten minutes. The support columns are further apart than expected.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: You need help?

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Negative. Just watch our back.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Ten more minutes? We needed to be tail-lights in five.
[They hear a scream coming from somewhere above.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Well we’re in the shit now. We have extra C4, yeah?

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Yeah. Why?

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Let's buy ourselves time.
[Meanwhile, the Evil Raiden is battling hordes of demons outside. Jade walks up to the resurrected Kitana and Liu Kang.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Emperor! Empress! Earthrealmers have captured the Bone Temple!

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: But Raiden --

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: He's the diversion!
[Cassie sets the C4.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Lock and load.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: What's going on up there?!

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Watching your back, General.
[Kitana attacks Cassie.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Kitana. "Empress" of the dead.

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: I've not forgotten our last encounter at the Sky Temple.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: How are your scars healing?
[CASSIE CAGE VS KITANA]

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Move! Move, move, move!
[Sonya is trying to lead her soldiers, but Liu Kang gets in the way. He destroys the passage, burying the soldiers and Sonya under the rubble.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: General? General!!

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: She's trapped, Cassandra Cage.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: How “The Chosen One” has fallen. Raiden's right. Whatever Shinnok did to you, you’re a lost cause.
[CASSIE CAGE VS RESURRECTED LIU KANG]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Fuck. You. General, can you hear me?! General? Mom?

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: I’m here, Cass.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Hang tight. We’ll get you guys out.

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: They’re gone, Cass. And I'm not gonna make it.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: What? I'm not leaving you behind!

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: Get your team home. That’s an order. Your duty. Mine's to finish the mission.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Mom, no! We can save you!

Speaker: Sonya Blade
Text: I love you, Cass. Give your dad a kiss for me.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Mom, no don't -- Mom? Mom!
[Sonya squeezes the trigger.]

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: She’s started the detonation sequence!

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Override it, Jacqui!

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: There is no override! Commander! Our orders are to leave.
[The army of demons appears.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: C'mon, move it!
[The heroes start to run. They leave the temple.]

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: Your mother died a warrior's death. May we all be so fortunate.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: You did not just say that.
[Cassie hears a familiar voice...]

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Thank God you're back. How did the mission – No…
[He hugs Cassie. Meanwhile...]

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: Without the Cathedral’s power, we stand alone. We are vulnerable.
[A woman from prologue appears.]

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: Who are you? One of Raiden's Elder Gods, here to taunt us?

Speaker: Woman
Text: No, Kitana. I am much more. Behold!
[She restores the tower, destroyed by the explosion. Sonya died in vain.]

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: What power is this?!

Speaker: Woman
Text: I am Kronika, Keeper of Time The Sands of Time guide the destiny of the realms and every soul therein. I have carefully crafted them to keep the realms in balance. But my work's perfection has been irreversibly taunted by Raiden’s actions. The two of you have felt that pain most acutely.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: What can be done? The past is the past, is it not?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: It need not be. I intend to wind time back to its beginning and restart history. But even with my vast power, I cannot create this New Era alone.

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: How will this New Era be different?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: In many ways. But most importantly, there will be no Raiden.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: How do we begin?
[The guard brings someone in chains to Kotal’s feet.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: For years you escaped my justice. Sucked dry the bounty of Outworld’s people. Today, your debt is paid.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: Kill me, Kotal, and you lose profit.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: You mistake me for Shao Kahn. I do not inflict bandits upon the poor.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: Shao Kahn approved! His word was law!
[One of the servants brings Kotal his sword.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Your master is dead, so is his “law”. Never again will Outworld suffer from his corruption.
[he raises his sword but an earthquake happens. And as we learn its happened everywhere. The Sands of Time bring the younger versions of many Mortal Kombat characters straight from original games.]

Speaker: Evil Raiden
Text: By the Elder Gods!

[He disappears. Only Shinnok’s amulet drops on the floor. The prisoners realize themselves. The Sands of Time bring Skarlet, Erron Black, Baraka, original bald Kano and the ruler of the Netherrealm itself – Shao Kahn. On the other side appears Kitana, Liu Kang, Kung Lao, Jade and Raiden.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Raiden? Shao Kahn?

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: General Kotal?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Kotal Kahn.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: Kahn? Pathetic fool. You pretend to my throne!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: It is mine, by right and deed. You were killed, long ago. As was your repugnant spawn, Mileena.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: We were at the Mortal Kombat tournament. Kung Lao had just defeated Shang Tsung and Quan Chi.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: We are decades beyond those events.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: For us, they happened only moments ago.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: What game are you playing, Raiden? What magic powers this delusion?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: If it is a delusion, it is one we all share. Is it possible that the past and future are colliding?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Kitana, Baraka, Skarlet, all Outworld champions long since gone. If you have all returned, has...?

Speaker: Jade
Text: I am here, Kotal.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Jade.
[Shao Kahn pushes Jade behind.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Osh-Tekk custom requires all refugees be offered assistance. I offer it to you, Shao Kahn --

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: I am no refugee! I am Kahn of Outworld. Vacate my throne. Or I'll soak these sands with your blood!
[They have a fight.]

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Lord Raiden? What do we do?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I have not met Kotal. But he is reputed to be a man of honor.

Speaker: Jade
Text: It’s true. I know him well.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Then we must navigate this crisis by aiding him.

Speaker: Baraka
Text: Stupid Osh-Tekk. Destroying your future, crossing Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: It is you with no future, Baraka. Your Tarkatans are dead.

Speaker: Baraka
Text: Impossible!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: They allied with Mileena against me. Persist, and you will die again.
[KOTAL KAHN VS BARAKA]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Filthy Tarkatan. The orphan turned assassin.

Speaker: Skarlet
Text: Better to thrive in Shao Kahn’s court than starve in the streets. You Osh-Tekk may practice blood magic, Kotal, but I am the master.
[KOTAL KAHN VS SKARLET]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Pride will be your downfall.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Kotal!
[They kiss.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: I thought you were dead! What happened to you?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Shao Kahn betrayed me. Ambushed my legion. I was kept alive for Shang Tsung’s experiments. Only when he died, was I freed.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Seeing you again makes it worth living this nightmare.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: I will not lose you twice.
[Erron Black enters.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Go help the Earthrealmers. I will deal with this.  Your future self is ally, not enemy, Erron Black.

Speaker: Erron Black
Text: To hell with the future. I live in the moment.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Given who you become, I would not have thought you so reckless.
[KOTAL KAHN VS ERRON BLACK]
[Kotal goes to the arena, where mass battles between fighters take place. There he sees Shao Kahn.]

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: I will have my throne!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Outworld rejected your pointless wars.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: Empires must expand or die!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Your conquests served you alone not Outworld's people!
[KOTAL KAHN VS SHAO KAHN]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: You are Kahn no more.
[A cloud of flies appears in the sky. Flies restrain the fighters and Kotal himself. Di'vorah appears from the portal.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: D'Vorah.

Speaker: D'Vorah
Text: Shao Kahn! To me!
[Shao Kahn and his army leaves.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: I have not known stranger days.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Kotal Kahn. I am Raiden, Protector of Earthrealm.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: I know you.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: We are acquainted in your era?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: We were allies who became enemies.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I am surprised, given our shared antipathy toward Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Everything changed after your defeat of Shinnok.

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Shinnok’s defeated?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Our realms joined to fight him. But in victory, you were hardened. To protect Earthrealm, you lashed out at all realms you deemed threats.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: That cannot be.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: My Raiden wears Shinnok's Amulet as a symbol of his fury.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Be assured, Kotal Kahn. I am not that Raiden. We have common cause. Both in solving this temporal crisis, and in defeating Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Agreed.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Liu Kang, Kung Lao, and I will return to Earthrealm and learn what temporal anomalies have occurred there. We must better understand the phenomenon we are experiencing.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: I will have my scouts track Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Liu Kang (to Kitana)
Text: So, this is goodbye.

Speaker: Kitana
Text: Only goodbye for now. I can't leave while Shao Kahn threatens Outworld. I must seek justice for what he did to my family, and to all Edenia.

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: I will come back for you. To aid you, Princess.
[Kitana hugs him. Raiden, Liu Kang and Kung Lao leaves. Meanwhile in Shao Kahn’s hideout.]

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: You evade my questions, D'Vorah. I routed your people. Burned this hive. Yet you aid me.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: We can't trust her, Excellency. Kotal Kahn did, and she betrayed him to Shinnok.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: Kotal "Kahn" How is it I'm dead and he sits on my throne?

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: You tried merging Earthrealm into Outworld. The Elder Gods Intervened, and Raiden killed you. That’s when Mileena became Kahn.

Speaker: D’Vorah
Text: After This One killed your daughter, Kotal claimed the throne.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: You killed Mileena?! If this is true, you will die!
[Kronika and her servants appears.]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: D’Vorah is under my protection, Shao Kahn. As are you. I am Kronika.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: The legends are true?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: I am displeased with how history has unfolded.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: So you broke time?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: I stopped time. I enlist all those who disdain the current course of history. By merging past and present, we may draw upon allies from both eras.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: How will fighting your battles benefit me?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: I offer a greater empire in the New Era, Shao Kahn. Raiden will not exist to thwart you.

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: You can wipe Raiden from history?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: It is an immense task, requiring great power and effort. My Hourglass requires protection while I work. Will your Outworld armies defend it?

Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: They shall.
[The scene changes to Special Forces headquarters.]

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: I swear to god, I'm losing it. Can’t someone, anyone, explain to me what the hell is going on?!

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: Right? I’ve been in the future for a whole hour and I haven’t seen one jetpack. Not one!
[Raiden enters.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: So it’s true I walked a darker path.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: After Shinnok went down, you became a different person. Red lightning, black clothes. Authoritarian attitude adjustment.

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Yeah, about that. What happened to Dark you? How come you're an only child and we got an evil twin?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: As an immortal, I exist outside the normal laws of time. That could explain why I am affected differently.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Thanks.

Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Weird, isn't it? Not being in charge.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: That's what's weird?

Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: That. And having daughters our age.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Look at her. How do I have a kid? With him?

Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: At least she’s not an actress.

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: C’mon, at least think about it. We each get points off the gross. Coming this summer... Johnny Cage. AND. Johnny Cage! In: "Timequake"!

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Any thoughts on what we do next?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: For months, I have been receiving vague premonitions of the future. But none of them foretold this. I must confer with the Elder Gods. Liu Kang, Kung Lao. Please assist the Special Forces while I am gone.

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Yes, Lord Raiden.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Follow me.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Commander?

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Yes, Mom. I mean, General! I mean --

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: This is strange for me, too.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: You have no idea.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: What?

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: How do I say this? This morning, "we" were on a mission and… And you gave your life to save it.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Sonnuvabitch. Seriously?

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Yeah. And now here you are. Young enough to be my sister.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Cass, you need to see this! Sat feeds show a Netherrealm incursion at the Wu Shi Academy.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Netherrealm? Taking out Shinnok's Temple was suposed to stop them.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: It’s gotta be the time anomaly.

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: We must help our Shaolin masters.

Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Why would the Netherrealm want to bust up your alma mater, Liu Kang?

Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: The Dragon Grotto. It's underneath the Academy. Earthrealm’s Jinsel energy bubbles up in its springs.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: That’s no good. We’ve seen firsthand what happens when the Netherrealm screws wrth Earthrealm’s life force.

Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: They will not reach the Grotto. It is protected by powerful magic. The deadliest traps. I am sure our counterparts from your era are already dealing with them.
[Jacqui looks to Cassie with an awkward face, regarding of Liu Kang and Kung Lao’s future selves.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Kung Lao, Liu Kang. You might wanna sit down.
[Liu Kang and Kung Lao realize there is something awfully tragic with their future selves, just as Cassie explains how they have fallen.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [The legendary fighters walks to the Shaolin Temple.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: I die in the Koluseum! You on a rooftop, fighting Lord Raiden? Our future, Liu Kang. It is insane!

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Obsessing over it will not change it.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Neither will accepting our destiny as evil undead warlords.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: I'm not. But we can't change a future we don’t fully understand. Lord Raiden will guide us.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Can we trust him? It appears he got us both killed!

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [They find a dead monk on the steps of the temple. Walking inside they see dozens.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: So many Shaolin! They died defending our sacred ground. The Netherrealm will pay.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [They go further.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Whoever came here knew how to disarm these traps.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Do you know how? The monks never taught me.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: More likely you did not attend class. Watch for the pattern. And pick your moment…

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Liu Kang jumps. Kung Lao stops the blades with his epic hat.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Easy enough. What's next?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Everything. Poison gas, shooting spears, flame jets --

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: How about we avoid those?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [The room shuts firmly.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: I did not do that.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Scorpion
Text: I did.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Scorpion. Of course you survived the time-merger...

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Scorpion
Text: You will not stop Kronika from restoring my family and clan.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: If Scorpion doesn’t kill us, these traps will. Find a way to shut them down!  Let's see whose fire burns hotter.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [LIU KANG VS SCORPION]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Your fire is out, Scorpion.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: I can’t stop them!

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [The room begins to fill with poisonous gas. Scorpion leaves. The monks fall into a cage. Suddenly the gas sucks away.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: It’s stopped. Why?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Resurrected Jade and Scorpion enters.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Our plans require that you live.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Jade. What happened to you?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: An untimely death. Like yours, due to Raiden’s incompetence.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: You cannot turn us against him. We know about our deaths. They were caused by our mistakes.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: You have been deceived, Liu Kang. The truth is, Raiden murdered you.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Lord Raiden may make mistakes, but he doesn't murder his followers.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Is it not murder to send an ill-prepared warrior to his death? Raiden’s mistake cost your life, Kung Lao.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [RESURRECTED JADE VS KUNG LAO]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: I like the "real" you better.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: The Dragon Grotto's through there.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: What if the next Revenants we have to fight are... us?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Then we fight them, Kung Lao.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Meanwhile Raiden comes to the Elder Gods.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Elder Gods. I have come to seek counsel. The realms are in crisis.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Elder Gods
Text: The crisis is grave, indeed, Raiden. Every being will be erased in a temporal Armageddon, even we Elder Gods. Already our power weakens.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: I will fight Cetrion. But how?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Elder Gods
Text: You must find Kronika’s Keep and gain control of her Hourglass. Only then will time's momentum be restored.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: It will be done.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Elder Gods
Text: Speak your mind, Raiden.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Since this time-merger, I have learned about my future. That my champions fall. That I become a tyrant. If Kronika is defeated, will I be consigned to this grim fate?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Elder Gods
Text: The restoration of time will not predetermine your destiny. That is for you to shape.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Meanwhile the monks find their way into a secret cave. One of Kronika’s servants steals something that we don’t see.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Is there any point to us asking you to put those back?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: They said you'd come.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Who said?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: Who do you think, Kung Lao? Welcome to your future. Courtesy of Raiden.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Our future may be tragic, but it’s not Lord Raiden's fault. You’ve both been warped by Shinnok’s evil.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Kung Lao
Text: Shao Kahn snapped my neck in the arena. Raiden saw it coming, and did nothing!

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: I would have defeated Shao Kahn, but Raiden wanted the glory. His lightning cut me down.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: No. I don't believe that!

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: One day Raiden will betray you. Then you will believe.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: You spew Shinnok’s lies. You attacked Lord Raiden, and he defended himself. He did what he thought right to protect Earthrealm.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: Protect?! Raiden enslaves Earthrealm. How was I ever so blind as you?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [LIU KANG VS RESURRECTED LIU KANG]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: How did I get so deluded?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Is it me, or could they be telling the truth?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Worry about it later. We have bigger problems.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: You should’ve listened to your Revenant counterparts. With this power, Kronika will remake history.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Kung Lao chops his head off with the hat.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: That was easy.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [But the Sands of Time resurrect Kronika’s servant.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: I, Geras, am a fixed point in time. With every death and rebirth, I grow stronger.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: The vials.  Sizing me up?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Geras
Text: Kronika has a keen interest in you. It's why she recruited your revenant self. Serve her, she will bless you.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [LIU KANG VS GERAS]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Geras
Text: You Shaolin monks exceed your reputation. I respect your spirit, but Kronika’s will must be done.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [He stops time, takes the vials and gives them to Kronika that appeared a second ago.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Geras
Text: It's dangerous to let them live.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kronika
Text: If they die, their Revenant selves will cease to exist. We need them to defend the Keep. Yet again, Liu Kang, you've chosen the wrong destiny.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [She teleports to Shao Kahn.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kronika
Text: I now have the energy to resculpt the Sands of Time. The Netherrealm's undead army will protect the Keep as I work. Shao Kahn, when will you deliver the Outworld army?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Shao Kahn
Text: Soon. It will be mine once Kotal is killed.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kronika
Text: And what is your progress, Sektor?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Sector
Text: The Cyber Lin Kuei factory is modified to your specification. Production exceeds projections.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [Raiden returns to the monks.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Lord Raiden. What did the Elder Gods say?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: We must find Kronika. Wrest the control of history from her. If we succeed, our destiny can change.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: So what we were told is true? You were "Involved" in our deaths?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Yes. Had the timeline continued, my decisions would have led to your deaths. But the Elder Gods assure me that such a future is not inevitable. This is but one of many possible timelines.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: That is a lot to take on faith.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Rest assured, Kung Lao. I am aware, now, of what may come. I will not bring harm to either of you. You have my vow.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Liu Kang
Text: Thank you, Lord Raiden.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: We must find Kronika’s Keep and strike it, as hard and fast as we can muster, before all is lost.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Text: [They walk to Special Forces headquarters.]

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: What have you learned about Kronika's effect on Earthrealm?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: We’re tracking sites around the globe with major temporal anomalies. Picture’s still fuzzy...

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Our kid's something, isn’t she?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Um... Cage, I m not your Sonya.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Sorry. Too easy to forget.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: We’ve prioritized info that correlates attacks from the Netherrealm with time anomalies.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Helpful. But we have more to worry about than the Netherrealm.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Yeah, we do. Grandmaster Sub-Zero reports heavy losses to his Lin Kuei clan. The time merger has resurrected his old enemy, Sektor.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Sektor? Was he not the Grandmaster who years ago enslaved the Lin Kuei?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: That's him. He's reactivating and upgrading the same factory he built to convert the Lin Kuei into cyber killing machines.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Undoubtedly to construct new and more powerful Cyber Lin Kuei. Kronika may seek to co-opt them. What of Sub-Zero?

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Already on his way to shut down the factory. Grandmaster Hasashi is going with him.

Chapter: SHAOLIN MONKS / LIU KANG & KUNG LAO
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Grandmaster Hasashi? Hanzo Hasashi?
[Sub-Ziro examines the terrain on the way to the factory. Scorpion is silently approaching him with his hand on the sword.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Your hearing is failing, Sub-Zero.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: I recognized your footsteps, Hanzo.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Where's Sektor? I will not let him threaten my clan again.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: The old Cyber Lin Kuei factory was defunct, buried beneath this quarry -- until the time disruption. Now, Sektor's returned and reactivated it. He's budding an army by processing Lin Kuei warriors kidnapped from my temple.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: I can see why you need me.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: We could enter through that tunnel, but a frontal assault would be...

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Bloody.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Needlessly dangerous. There’s another entrance, less populated.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: And the rest of your plan?

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: We get help on the inside…
[They sneak into the factory and find piles of mutilated skinned corpses.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: We’ll avenge your clan.
[Cyrax and a woman enter. The woman turns on the machine that makes cyborgs.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Cyrax is your inside man?

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: He was converted against his will. If we disable the behavior inhibitors that control him --

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: He will turn on Sektor.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: All Cyber Lin Kuei are linked to a common network. Cyrax can shut them down from within.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Who is the woman?

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: I don't know Focus on disabling Cyrax. He’s the key.

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: We require additional candidates for cyberization.

Speaker: Woman
Text: Once delivered, how long before the next generation is ready?
[Sub-Zero freezes the woman. Hanzo attacks Cyrax. The woman quickly cracks the icy cage.]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Frost! I gave you a home. I was your mentor. Yet after all this, you ally with Sektor? He corrupted the Lin Kuei!

Speaker: Frost
Text: You corrupted our clan when you made peace with this Shirai Ryu filth! with Kronika’s help, I will restore the Lin Kuei’s honor.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Keep Cyrax alive. We need him.  There’s no future in which you are fit to lead the Lin Kuei.

Speaker: Frost
Text: You always doubted me, Sub-Zero. Held me back. Kronika sees my true potential.
[SUB-ZERO VS FROST]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: You deceive yourself, Frost.  The upgrade, Cyrax. Is this Kronika's doing?

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: To better serve her, Sub Zero. We defend Kronika as she re-writes history.
[Cyrax activates other cyborgs.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: So you're nothing but pawns?

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: We act to secure the Lin Kuei’s glory in the New Era.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Take the others.
[Scorpion teleports and quickly destroy the cyborgs.]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: You’ve been enslaved, Cyrax. First by Sektor, now by Kronika. It ends today.
[SUB-ZERO VS CYRAX]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: You will be freed.
[He destroys Cyrax’s behavior inhibitors.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: Hurry before we face more Cyber Lin Kuei.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: He'll need a moment to initialize.
[Someone punches Scorpion.]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Sektor? Show yourself!

Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: Recognize me, little brother?

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Bi-Han?!

Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: Yes. It is I.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: You were killed, swallowed in a storm of souls.

Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: Quan Chi’s creations do not die easily. Kronika offers me a new clan to lead. Its shadow will darken the realms.

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: I've beaten your brother before.

Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: Quan Chi unleashed your vengeance. Without him? You are weak.
[SCORPION VS NOOB SAIBOT]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: My strength is more than vengeance.
[Cyrax reboots.]

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: No. He ripped out my heart. Made me a machine.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Your soul is intact, Cyrax. Trust me, I speak from experience.

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: Kuai Liang, is that you? You look so old. And Scorpion?

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: We’ll explain later. For now, know we share the same goal: the Cyber Lin Kuei's destruction.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: We need your help, Cyrax.

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: I can disable their communications network. It'll shut down this factory and every Cyber Lin Kuei connected to it.
[Someone shoots a rocket at them, but Cyrax uses his net to catch it.]

Speaker: Sektor
Text: Frost warned me that you two had become allies. I did not think you capable of such dishonor, Sub-Zero.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: I'll stop Sektor. Help Cyrax.
[Sector shoots his flamethrowers at Scorpion but it seems to have no effect on him.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: You started this fire. Selling out your clan so Quan Chi would slaughter mine.

Speaker: Sektor
Text: He should have killed you as he promised. Now I finish what he could not.
[SCORPION VS SEKTOR]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: For Harumi and Satoshi.
[Meanwhile Cyrax gains access to the mainframe.]

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: I’m in. I’ll reformat the system drives and shut us all down. Goodbye, Kuai Liang.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: It is not the end. I will find a way to restore you. Anything is possible. Hanzo and I are living proof.

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: Please, don’t bring me back as a machine. I can't live like this.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Machine or man, you have a warrior’s soul. As long as I am Grandmaster, the Lin Kuei will welcome you.

Speaker: Cyrax
Text: Then until we meet again.
[Cyrax crushes giant cables and has a short circuit. Frost, Noob and Sektor leave.]

Speaker: Hanzo Hasashi
Text: They’ve escaped. We should pursue.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: First we speak with Raiden.
[Meanwhile at Kronika’s base.]

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: Our lady Kronika’ll get all the service she needs. But I can't quote a fee until I know the job.

Speaker: Geras
Text: You will see.
[They come to a room with a damaged Sektor on the table.]

Speaker: Geras
Text: Can you restore him?

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: There’s some frame damage, Circuitry looks good. But looks like someone did a software Wipe. Fixing that won’t come cheap.

Speaker: Geras
Text: Once he is repaired, can he be replicated? Hundreds of times? Thousands?

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: That’s a tall order. But anything’s possible, with the right help.

Speaker: Geras
Text: Serve Kronika and she will provide.
[Old Kano comes from the shadows.]

Speaker: Kano
Text: Take the deal. Trust me. Otherwise, who can you trust? You weren’t kidding. S’like a mirror, reflecting the past.

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: How ‘bout that? Over fifty and still a ripper. (punches himself in the shoulder]

Speaker: Erron Black
Text: There’s still the matter of our fee.

Speaker: Kano
Text: We get paid in the New Era. Kronika'll make sure the Black Dragon come out on top. Not only in the black market. In every market.

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: Right then, let’s get to business.
[Special Forces headquarters. Jacqui tries to call her dad.]

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Reach your dad yet, kid?

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: The network's still down. I hate being so far away. Dad must be climbing the walls.

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: Be patient. You’ll get through.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: I know my dad's still alive, but it's like I'm seeing a ghost.

Speaker: Johnny Cage
Text: You and me both. But they aren't ghosts. They're definitely real.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Can this get any more bizarre?
[Briggs Farm. Jax searching for his phone.]

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Oh, come on... Damn it! Come on, come on…
[The call fails. He can’t call Jacqui. He goes mad and drinks himself to sleep. Kronika appears.]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Jackson Briggs. Do not fear. I have come to offer you a new life -- a better life.

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: That's awfully generous, seeing as we’ve never met.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: We have not met, but I know you. How valiantly you have served, how horribly you have suffered. That was not my plan for you.

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Your plan?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: You were to retire distinguished, not in disgrace. Years from now. General Jackson Briggs. More importantly, your daughter was not to serve, nor endure the same tragedies you have. Your home should be filled with grandchildren. Help me and it will be.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: The Tarkatans, long extinct, have also returned.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Shao Kahn will seek them out. He relies on their power.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Kotal’s scouts tracked a Tarkatan war party to the Kytinn’s Lost Hive, D’Vorah’s ancestral home. Her hand in Shao Kahn’s escape makes that our starting point.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Please advise me of what you learn. I must consult with the Elder Gods.
[He leaves. Kitana appears.]

Speaker: Kitana
Text: When do we leave?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Your duty lies elsewhere, Princess. I need you to enlist Queen Sheeva. Her support is critical, against both Kronika and Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Kitana
Text: Surely you can--

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Queen Sheeva does not trust me. No Shokan has Since my bloody battle with Goro.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Sheeva’s always respected your opinion more than anyone's. When she hears you support Kotal, she'll join us.

Speaker: Kitana
Text: If that is my duty, so be it.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Thank you, Princess.
[He leaves.]

Speaker: Kitana
Text: Are you my friend or his consort?

Speaker: Jade
Text: It was my idea, Kitana. It's in your best interest. Succeed with Sheeva, and Kotal will pledge his loyalty to you. There's no bond more sacred to an Osh-Tekk like him.
[Soon Jade and Kotal Kahn ride through the desert.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: I remember when we could ride like this alone.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: My life has changed as Outworld’s Kahn. Thankfully, you have not.

Speaker: Jade
Text: You haven't changed much either, despite the years. You're still the same noble warrior I met in Shao Kahn's court. And now you're Kahn. I'm surprised no woman has claimed your bed and become your queen.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Many have tried.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Yet they failed? Why?

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: None of them were you.

Speaker: Jade
Text: There are fresh tracks leading into the Hive. If Shao Kahn's in there, he'll be difficult to find. The tunnels are endless.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Set fire to them. If he's hidden, he will be smoked out.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Kotal, we don't know who else is in there.
[An earthquake happens and an army of giant bugs appears. They take Jade underground.]

Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Hold her!
[Jade frees herself.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: By the Gods, it’s true? This is what I become?!

Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Blame your loyalty to Kitana. It led directly to our death.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Then so be it. I would not trade Kitana's friendship for anything.

Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: it is pitiful you choose servitude.

Speaker: Jade
Text: She and I fight side-by-side, against Shao Kahn. His oppression cannot stand!
[JADE VS RESURRECTED JADE]

Speaker: Jade
Text: When called for a higher purpose, we must serve.
Ack-Na ! Kot-tek-hah!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: You will bleed for your betrayal, D’Vorah.

Speaker: D’Vorah
Text: This One acts only for the Hive’s survival.
[They fight and D’Vorah wins. She almost succeeds in feeding Kotal with her delicious maggots, like she did with Mileena in the previous game, but Jade interrupts the feast.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: You'd best flee, D’Vorah. Kotal is mine.
[JADE VS D’VORAH]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Wish to survive? Tell us where to find Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Ghosts of my past. D’Vorah spoke the truth. We are outnumbered.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Give me a few of your best soldiers. We’ll infiltrate the camp and search for Shao Kahn unseen.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: What you propose is dangerous.

Speaker: Jade
Text: Of course it is.
[She with a few warriors infiltrates Tarkatan camp.]

Speaker: Tarkatan 1
Text: Okot nara toka nit Ratash, oko nar?

Speaker: Tarkatan 2
Text: Nar hartak latah ratk.

Speaker: Tarkatan 1
Text: Alk Tarkata aka ha, Tetakh.

Speaker: Tarkatan 2
Text: No nakhut nay. Trakka tor no rakata.

Speaker: Tarkatan 1
Text: Kabak takarwak hakta kaht? Tak pakar rah batahat.

Speaker: Tarkatan 3
Text: Tor parkaht. Wak kaht nak Shao Kahn kolkat ha trabakar.

Speaker: Tarkatan 1
Text: Wakt hakka turk. Wak rakata raynar Kotal khanak.

Speaker: Tarkatan 3
Text: Nar oko papkhat.
[Jade and her warriors stumbles upon... a Tarkatan woman?]

Speaker: Tarkatan woman?
Text: Toh ha na? Taka ha na aki Tarkata? Nay... Nay... Trakka ti!
[One of the warriors is ready to kill her but Jade stops him.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: No.

Speaker: Tarkatan woman?
Text: Parkah...

Speaker: Jade
Text: It's all right. We won't harm you.

Speaker: Tarkatan woman?
Text: Nay ti oto nokorta.

Speaker: Jade
Text: We're looking for Shao Kahn.

Speaker: Tarkatan woman?
Text: Shao Kahn? Pakta ray Shao Kahn?

Speaker: Jade
Text: Please… We only need to…
[The camp rises in alarm.]

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: With me!
[Jade fights for her life until she met the prisoner. Meanwhile Kotal smashes the army of Tarkatan he was outnumbered for.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: All these years and still you exploit others to rise above your station.

Speaker: Prisoner
Text: I have risen to my station Jade. Before Shao Kahn raised me up, Outworlders despised the Naknada. Now they fear us. Tell me that is not progress!
[JADE VS KOLLECTOR]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Fear and respect are not equals.

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: Line them up. Execute them.
[Jade interrupts the executions.]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Kotal, this is cruel! Many didn’t fight us. There are children!

Speaker: Kotal Kahn
Text: You forget, in my time they joined Mileena in rebellion against me. These aren’t the same Tarkatans, Kotal. A better Kahn would offer them a warm hand, not cold steel.
[JADE VS KOTAL KAHN]

Speaker: Jade
Text: Your heart has hardened, Kotal.
[Shao Kahn and his generals enter. He takes a long for the pathetic Kahn that lies on the ground. We switch to Raiden that comes to the Elder Gods but their temple lies in ruins.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: It is too late.
Blame yourself for the Elder Gods' deaths, Raiden. Your actions have irrevocably altered Kronika’s golden balance of light and dark. Shinnok’s decapitation was the cap stone.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: You are a paragon of virtue. You should wish evil vanished!
I abide my mother's will.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: You were begotten by Kronika.

As was my brother, Shinnok. The darkness to my light. Nature demands equilibrium. Balance is perfection. You have stepped out of your role, made that balance impossible. That's why the New Era holds no place for you.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: You will not succeed.
Kotal Kahn is captured, Raiden. The combined might of Outworld and the Netherrealm will keep your forces at bay -- while my mother finishes her work.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Do not underestimate Earthrealm’s warriors.
You are right to have been fond of these mortals. They were good souls.
[Meanwhile at Special Forces headquarters young Jax got new arms.]

Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Man. These arms are an upgrade. It’ll be payback time, next time I see Ermac.

Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Oh I made sure he got his.
