Text: C’mon. You’ve been dyin’ to hit me all day. Here’s your chance.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: And give them the satisfaction of watching us fight? Like hell.

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: You said it: they’ll kill us whether we fight or not. Fighting buys us time to find a way out. So quit being a diva and hit me!
[She hits him in the face and stomach. Johnny can barely stand on her feet.]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Take a dive!

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: No way. These people know a dive when they see one.
[Sonya swings for another punch, but suddenly the gate blows up. Cassie and her men breaking into the room guns blazing.]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Three. Two.
[But… Erron Black blocks their way. He shoots Johnny in the shoulder. Erron cocks his revolver again to kill Johnny lying on the floor, but Sonya kicks him on the arm.]

Speaker: Erron Black
Text: Now ain’t this a thrill. Bagging the legendary Sonya Blade.
[YOUNG SONYA BLADE VS ERRON BLACK]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Lieutenant!

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: He needs a med evac. We’re gonna have to fight our way out to the rendezvous. You’ll need these.
[They're taking Johnny and retreating. Cassie's with guns in both hands kills thugs like in a shooting gallery. Kano shows up with a nine-barrel machine gun.]

Speaker: Kano
Text: Where do you think you’re going?
[Kano starts shooting the area. Cassie, Sonya and Johnny hide behind the truck. He notices them and sends a few big-caliber greetings to Cassie's chest. Sonya wants to return the favor.]

Speaker: Cassie
Text: No! It’s too dangerous!
[Sonya attacks Cano, jumping off a truck. They're exchanging punches. Young Kano comes.]

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: Best thing about this future, love? I’m alive, but you‘re dead as a doornail.

Speaker: Kano
Text: Worst thing is, it’s those Netherrealm stiffs did you in. Shoulda been me.

Speaker: Young Kano
Text: Let s have ourselves a do-over.
[Sonya kicks both their arses.]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: You might be alive in this future, but that can change.
[YOUNG SONYA BLADE VS YOUNG KANO]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Let me give you a break.
[She steps on his throat.]

Speaker: Kano
Text: Now this is a pickle. Can you break his neck faster than I can gut Pretty Boy?Don’t forget. It’s two-for-one. He dies, so does your little girl!

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Thanks, Kano.

Speaker: Kano
Text: For what?

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: For reminding me of the rules.
[She pulls out a gun and shoots Young Kano in the head. Kano dies theatrically. Some time passes. Sonya bandages Johnny's wounds.]

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: Sweet move. I’m totally stealing that one for Timequake. How about… dinner sometime? Y’know, to thank you for saving my life? And apologize for being, well, me. No pressure. No romance.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Patience is a virtue, Cage. What is that?
[Geras, Kronika's henchmen shows up. The bullets do not cause him any damage. He kills soldiers one by one.]

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: Who’s the special guest villain?

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Geras, Kronika’s goon. Allegedly, he can’t be killed.

Speaker: Young Johnny Cage
Text: I fought a dude like that in Fatal Infinity –hrnngh!!

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Get him evac’ed. I’ll keep this thing occupied.

Speaker: Geras
Text: Sonya Blade. Mother of Cassie Cage.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Yeah, what of it?

Speaker: Geras
Text: Cassie Cage defeated Shinnok, son of Kronika. I am his mother’s vengeance.
[YOUNG SONYA BLADE VS GERAS]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Stay away from my daughter.
[Unexpectedly, Cassie enters the battlefield on a forklift. She nails Geras to the wall.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Try coming back from this.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: You okay?

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I’ll be fine. I come from tough stock.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Listen. What I said back at the base, about the mission. It wasn’t fair. You’re a damn fine soldier. I’m so proud, I can almost picture myself dating Johnny. Almost.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I wish I could go back. Do our last mission over.

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: It wasn’t easy, finding out how I die--or, could die. But I re-read the file. You followed orders. Saved your squad. I’m just glad that my sacrifice saved Earthrealm – and you. Besides, you heard Raiden. Things’ll never go back to what they were. We all have to “choose our destiny”.
[Geras's blood is starting to come together.]

Speaker: Young Sonya Blade
Text: Liu Kang and Kung Lao weren’t kidding about this guy…

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: All squads withdraw! Evac, now!
[Meanwhile...]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Geras failed. When he returns, I will strengthen him further for the final battle.
[Resurrected Liu Kang approaches her.]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Speak your mind.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: We’ve lost Shao Kahn, his Outworld army, and now the Black Dragon.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: While Raiden’s allies have burned precious time fighting Kano and Shao Kahn, our most important work has continued, uninterrupted, on Shang Tsung’s island.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: That island is in ruins. What could possibly--

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Timecraft requires an abundance of raw temporal energy. Every mortal soul contains a lifetime of this power. Every hour, every minute, every second lived, is stored within.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: Shang Tsung fed off souls. He collected them.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: In his Well of Souls which remains, untouched, beneath his island. A destiny I crafted for Shang Tsung, in case I ever had need. Shang Tsung’s souls will be mine.
[Resurrected Liu Kang smiles and bows.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Young Jax and his daughter are sailing on a giant warship.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: How’s the view?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: No sign yet of the mystical barrier you mentioned.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Oh, you’ll know it when it comes.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: How you feeling?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: For the first time in a while, in control. I got tossed into the deep end of this world of gods and monsters. But now, knowing my future, I feel like I’ve finally come up for air. Those bad things that happened to me... I mean, will happen to me? Like Raiden said, it’s gonna be different. Isn’t this good news?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: The things that happened to my Dad. That trauma he suffered. It’s why my parents met. They fell in love while he was in recovery. If they don’t happen, you and Mom may not meet. I may never be born.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Jacqui, I can’t pretend I get all this cosmic time stuff, but I do know you are here for a reason. You’re not just some random accident.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: I hope so.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [They come to the ruins of some island.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Shang Tsung’s island!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Here we go again. When I was here for the tournament, there were people everywhere. These guys looked a lot younger. Seems like only yesterday…

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Guess after Shang Tsung died, this place did, too. Nobody’s home. So much for needing stealth. Should’ve brought the whole squad.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Kinda hoping Raiden’s wrong about the Well of Souls. I don’t wanna be here longer than we--

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Multiple contacts!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: How many?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Two! But one of ‘em’s circling us real fast!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [They're being attacked by the Resurrected Kabal and Jade.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Kabal
Text: Kronika knew Raiden would send someone here.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Give me ten seconds with this guy.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Kabal
Text: Jax Briggs. We were partners under Quan Chi’s command. You’ll pm me again.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Got the wrong Jax. I haven’t been a Revenant. And I never will.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [YOUNG JAX BRIGGS VS RESURRECTED KABAL]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Times are changing, Kabal.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Meanwhile, Jacqui fights with Resurrected Jade. Jade wins and uses her staff to raise the dead monks.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Rise in Shinnok’s name! You’ll not disturb Kronika’s work.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Disturb? Try ending.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: You’re done messing with the Well of Souls.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: You’re not as strong as you think, Jax. As I recall, Sindel made quick work of you.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: I’ll take the lady in green.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Jacqui starts fighting with monks, often getting hit in the head.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Was a time when you knew who to fight for But between Quan Chi and Kronika, your mind ain’t right.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: I joined Raiden against Shao Kahn. He led me to my doom. Now Raiden leads you there, too.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [YOUNG JAX BRIGGS VS RESURRECTED JADE]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: I’ll take my chances with Raiden.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Enough dancing with the dead. Raiden said this Well of Souls would be underground.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: This way.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [They enter a dark cave. There are human skulls lying on the floor.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: This is Goro’s Lair?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Thankfully minus Goro. Shang Tsung kept me locked up here, back at my first tournament. Never thought I’d be back…

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Remember where a Well of Souls might be?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Couldn’t tell you. I was pretty beat up. It’s all a bit hazy.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Soon they find, well… a well… of souls.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: I’m guessing this is it.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: That crown. Five bucks says it’s Kronika’s.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: It’s drawing souls from the Well.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: There’s no way that thing’s unguarded. Let’s grab-and-go before whoever’s on duty gets back.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Voice
Text: I never left.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [There's a short fight going on. Our heroes lose.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Who are you?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: A deathly shadow. In life, I was called Bi-Han.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: And I should know who that is?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: The first Sub-Zero. Scorpion ripped out his spine. Left it in a heap upstairs, in Shang Tsung’s old throne room.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: An event the New Era will wipe from history.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Hang on, Jacqui. I got this.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Noob Saibot
Text: Ermac was weak. He took your arms but did not finish you.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Got that right. I’m just that tough.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [YOUNG JAX BRIGGS VS NOOB SAIBOT]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Guess Ermac’s not the only one who’s weak. C’mon. Let’s get that thing and get outta here.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Jacqui makes a brilliant decision to take the crown of the Kronika from the Well of Souls with her bare hands.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Voice
Text: Jacqui, wait.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Jax comes out of the shadows.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Mind. Blown.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Dad? How’d you get here?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: I’ll give you one guess.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Dad, your -- your arms! Those look like Kronika’s design. What are you doing?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Giving you the life you deserve.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: By destroying the universe?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Restarting it, not destroying it. Being a Revenant. The years I lost, the things I did. Your Ma held me together. But I was never the father you needed.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: You’re talking nonsense, man. You raised a fine daughter. She’s one helluva soldier.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: She shouldn’t have been a soldier! I never wanted you out there, taking those risks. If I hadn’t fallen apart, you wouldn’t have felt the need to enlist.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: That’s not why I do this, Dad!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Please. Give that crown to me. I don’t want to hurt anybody.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: This is seriously messed up…

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Hang back, kid. I know I wouldn’t want to fight my Dad. How ‘bout we keep this between me, myself, and I? Never thought I’d stoop so low.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: You don’t know how bad it gets. Losing your arms was just the beginning.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: I know you suffered. You still do. But you don’t betray your unit, and you sure as hell don’t betray your family.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [YOUNG JAX BRIGGS VS JAX BRIGGS]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: There’s gotta be a way to make this right.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: He’s out, but he’ll recover How’re you?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Trippin’. You?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Ditto. We can’t leave him. Let’s get him and the crown outta here.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [They're taking the beaten Jax outside.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: If I never come back here it’ll be too soon.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: I heard that.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [From heaven, like the goddamn Jesus, Cetrion comes down.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Mortals! Surrender Kronika’s crown and the elder Jackson Briggs. No harm will come to you.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: No deal. We know you betrayed the Elder Gods, Cetrion.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Kronika must restore the balance that Raiden destroyed. Can you not see, he s the devil in these matters?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: At least he’s the devil we know.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Can we take an Elder God?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Cassie beat Shinnok.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Only because the Cages are born with crazy magic powers.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Maybe we have our own magic.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [He looks at Kronika’s crown at Jacqui’s belt.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Stand down, please. Resistance only ensures your suffering.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: I can’t let you do-

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: I’m not discussing it.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Your mind is too frail to Wield Kronika’s weapon. For your own safety, remove it!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: It’s not time for safety. It’s time for action.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [JACQUI BRIGGS VS CETRION]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Eat your heart out, Cassie Cage.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [She's trying to take off the crown, but she's not getting anywhere. Jax approaches and, to our surprise, easily removes the crown. Apparently, the most powerful artifact has had no impact on the mind of an ordinary girl.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: You were warned. Mere mortals cannot control the Crown. I did not wish to harm you. But now you have forced my hand…

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [She's making an earthquake. Jacqui falls into the abyss and barely grasps the ledge. The old Jax comes.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: The hell’re you doing’!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Give me the crown and I will spare her.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Don’t! Don’t give it to her! GO!!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Her life is in your hands.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Nobody here wants to hurt anyone. Now, please. Don’t let this happen to our girl.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: Dammit!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [He throws the crown to his old self.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Now bring Jacqui back.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [She closes the crack and moving Jacqui to the surface.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: Dad? How could you do this to me?!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: I’m not doing this to you, Jacqui. I’m doing it for you. I love you.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Kronika awaits our return.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [They disappear.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Young Jax Briggs
Text: C’mon. This fight isn’t over.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [Meanwhile...]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Kronika
Text: This will bring us our deliverance. Thank you, both of you. I sense apprehension, Jackson Briggs.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: I’m not usually surrounded by so many friendly faces.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Kronika
Text: We are unlikely allies, united for a common cause. Worry not. Liu Kang, Kitana. Are the armies assembled?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: They’re en route. Kitana and I will see that they arrive as planned.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Excellent.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [She puts the crown on her head.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Kronika
Text: So many souls! So much time! As my strength gathers, the New Era draws ever closer!

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Text: [At Scorpion’s dojo.]

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Raiden
Text: The report from Jacqueline Briggs. Her father’s actions have compromised our Situation gravely.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I know I can’t – I can’t believe he did this.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Even if we locate her Keep, Kronika’s power now likely exceeds the might of our combined forces.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Maybe we should rethink using Shinnok’s Amulet.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Raiden
Text: We cannot, Cassandra Cage.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I’ve seen what you can do with it. You held off the entire Netherrealm army. You weren’t even at full strength.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Raiden
Text: I dare not risk the temptations of its dark power. Even now it calls to me… Despite Kronika’s advantages, we must attack as soon as we know the Keep’s location.

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: It’s been hours since we heard from the Grandmasters. What’s the plan if they don’t come back?

Chapter: ALL IN THE FAMILY / JACQUI & JAX
Speaker: Raiden
Text: They must, or else hope is lost.
[We teleport to some cave. Scorpion and Sub-Zero are watching Cetrion leading an army of cyborgs.]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: Those warriors must be headed for Kronika’s Keep.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Agreed. But why not use Kharon’s fleet? The bridge clearly taxes her power.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: The fleet’s bound to Kharon. It sails only by his command. That it’s still moored suggests he won’t help Kronika.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: In which case he may help us.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: It looks like Kharon is home, perhaps hosting some unwelcome guests. Return to Earthrealm. Tell the others we’ve found him. We’ll deploy as soon as I return.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Are you certain Kharon will aid us?

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: No. But he’s our best chance.
[Scorpion sneaks to Kharon’s hut. He's lying on a table wrapped in some kind of slurry.]

Speaker: D’vorah
Text: You should have aided Kronika, Kharon. Now you must suffer.

Speaker: Kharon
Text: I am immortal, D’Vorah. You cannot kill me.

Speaker: D’vorah
Text: This One needs only render you unfit to ferry Kronika’s enemies.
[She screams as Scorpion grabs her with his legendary move.]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: Get over here! First Shinnok, now Kronika. You fight for lost causes.

Speaker: D’vorah
Text: This One ensures the Hive’s survival. You will not save the Shirai Ryu.
[SCORPION VS D’VORAH]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: The Shirai Ryu will not fall.
[Suddenly he gets hit... from himself.]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Your clan of imposters will indeed fall.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: I’ve restored the Shirai Ryu. Built a clan that’s never been stronger.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: On a foundation of pretenders and outsiders! Kronika told me.
[Hanso kicks his ass.]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Without our original bloodlines, there is no Shirai Ryu. Our clan’s massacre extinguished them! Kronika will revive the true Shirai Ryu in the New Era.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: Do not trust Kronika! She uses your anger to enslave you, as Quan Chi did both of us. I let go my rage, and it saved me. To save yourself, you must do the same.
[HANSO HASASHI VS SCORPION]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: It’s past time you were freed. We both know what truly drives you. It’s not Shirai Ryu pride, it’s your wife and child.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Harumi and Satoshi were stolen from me. Murdered. Seeing them again is all that matters.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: We share this pain. I fought through Hell to end it. But Kronika’s New Era is not the remedy. She would resurrect Shinnok. The same devil who brought death to our family and clan. He cannot be allowed to return. When I revived the Shirai Ryu, I vowed our clan would ensure Earthrealm s protection. Help me keep that promise.
[He's reaching out to Scorpion. Behind his back, D’vorah appears and pierces him with her “sprouts.”]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: Poison--

Speaker: D’vorah
Text: Kronika knew your past sins would distract you. Now This One ends your misery.
[Scorpion jumps in cuts off her “sprouts.”]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Now you die.
[D’vorah creeps away.]

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: Raiden is at the Fire Gardens. Enlist Kharon’s aid. Bring Raiden’s army to the Keep. You must!

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: You have my word.

Speaker: Hanso Hasashi
Text: The new Shirai Ryu are worthy. It’s heart, not blood, that makes them warriors.
[He dies. The wind and sad music brings us back to the dojo.]

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Your Shaolin masters, they’re ready?

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: They will fight until the last man.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: That is likely what it will take.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: There will not be a fight if Kharon does not help us. Is there any word from Grandmaster Hasashi?

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: No. If we do not hear soon, I will return to the Netherrealm.
[Scorpion appears.]

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Wrong Scorpion. This cannot be good.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Get Raiden.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: The Fire Gardens, rebuilt? The Shirai Ryu are indeed restored.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Why are you here, Scorpion? Where is Grandmaster Hasashi?

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: He is dead.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: And now you have come to finish us.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: I understand your mistrust, but I am here to assist you!

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: I find that impossible to believe.
[SCORPION VS SUB-ZERO]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: You misunderstand my intentions.
[He's struck by lightning, and flying off.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Who sent you here, Scorpion?

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: My future self is dead. I am here at his behest.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Grandmaster Hasashi sent you?

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: I honor his dying wish. Kharon will ferry your armies to the isle of Kronika. We must leave at once.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Do you have proof of Kharon’s offer?

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Only my word.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Your word is worthless. At the tournament, I trusted you to spare Bi-Han, and you betrayed me.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: A mistake born of rage. I seek redemption.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Lies, Scorpion, you are a slave. And Kronika is your master.
[SCORPION VS RAIDEN]

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: Raiden, you must listen!

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Spout your falsehoods elsewhere, Scorpion! Kronika will not entrap us.

Speaker: Scorpion
Text: It is no trap! Kharon awaits you in the Netherrealm.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Lord Raiden! We should listen. He may be telling the truth.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: There is only one way to find out.
[He takes Shinnok’s Amulet and hits Scorpion with its power.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Now, Scorpion. The truth!

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Raiden, stop this!

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Step aside, Liu Kang.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Put down the amulet! Its darkness is taking hold of you!
[Raiden hits Liu Kang with the power of the amulet.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Our time has run out. I do what I must to save Earthrealm. Stay down!

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: This is not the way. Scorpion is not the enemy this time.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Liu Kang, do not interfere!
[RAIDEN VS YOUNG LIU KANG]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Do not force my hand, Liu Kang. The realms hang in the balance! To defend them, I must command order!

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: I thought it impossible, but the Revenants were right. You cannot be trusted.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I do not need trust. I demand obedience!

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Enough of your madness. If you must die, so be it.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: This-- This has happened before…
[He sees a vision of the final battle with Shao Kahn.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Liu Kang, do not interfere! You cannot fight Shao Kahn! Liu Kang, stop!

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Enough of your madness. If you must die, so be it!
[They're fighting through a multitude of options for a possible future… We're back to the current time line, where Raiden manages to stop the fight.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I have been a fool, Liu Kang. Kronika’s puppet. We only battle because she wills it. I must help him.
[He heals Scorpion and helps him to get up.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I was wrong to doubt you. I, too, have been a slave to anger.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: I do not understand, Lord Raiden. Your rage was caused by Kronika?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Yes. I succumbed to her influence. But then, our confrontation... It unlocked memories. Memories not only from this timeline, but from timelines that have come before.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Wait a sec. Timelines? Plural?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Kronika has restarted time on countless previous occasions, using each timeline to learn and to perfect her plan. The details of each timeline are different. But in each one, events conspire to bring Liu Kang and I into conflict. In each one, he dies. Only Kronika has such power to control time and fate.

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: I don’t get it. Why do that?

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I do not know But be assured, Kronika will control us no longer.
[A sandstorm rises and Kronika appears. Time stops its course.]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: At long last, you see the pattern.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: The pattern, but not the purpose. Why set me against Liu Kang?

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Is it not obvious? Your combined power threatens my vision for the timeline.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Liu Kang and I will not be divided further by your machinations.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Oh, Raiden. Do you think this is the first time you made that vow? We have repeated this exact conversation so often, in so many timelines, I have lost count.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: This timeline will end differently.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: We have played out all possible scenarios, Raiden. You cannot win. You are welcome to try, of course. But without Liu Kang by your side.
[Liu Kang is kidnapped by Kronika via sand teleportation.]

Speaker: Kronika
Text: Enjoy these final hours, Raiden. They are all you have.
[Time is returning to normal.]

Speaker: Cassie Cage
Text: Liu Kang! Where is he?!

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Kronika has taken him to her isle. We must leave immediately. To save the realms, we must save Liu Kang.
[At Kronika’s hideout. Liu Kang is sitting chained up on a chair. He is guarded by armored Geras.]

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: A new look, just for me? You shouldn’t have. What do you want from me!

Speaker: Kronika
Text: You will aid in my protection.

Speaker: Young Liu Kang
Text: Not likely.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: I have mastered Shinnok’s sorcery. I will add your soul’s strength to mine, and finally avenge myself upon Raiden.

Speaker: Kronika
Text: My friends, Raiden’s armies are coming. They will fight us, and they will lose.
[We see Raiden and his army together with Kitana’s army sailing on Kharon's boat for the last battle.]

Speaker: Kharon
Text: Kronika’s isle lies beyond the fog.
[But from the fog appears something else...]

Speaker: Kharon
Text: Battleships. My ferries cannot fight a war.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: This fleet is under my protection.  If Kharon falls, our fleet cannot sail. Protect him at all costs.
[Meanwhile on the battleship...]

Speaker: Frost
Text: Ramming speed!
[Kronika’s army is sailing close to Kharon's ship. The battle with the cyborgs begins.]

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: I don’t want to fight, but I’ve got to. For Jacqui’s sake and mine.
[RAIDEN VS JAX BRIGGS]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Let me help you. Kronika’s promises to you are a cruel deception. She is the mother of Shinnok, the architect of your Revenant enslavement.

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: But-- No. She’s Cetrion’s mother.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Cetrion is Shinnok’s sister. In Kronika’s New Era, Shinnok will be the darkness to balance Cetrion’s light.

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Which’ll only happen if the realms keep on fighting each other. What have I done? I’m a fool.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: It is not foolish to fight for your family’s betterment.

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: I’m sorry, Raiden. I promise to make this right.
[He's starting to fight the cyborgs. Geras appears.]

Speaker: Geras
Text: I have died a thousand deaths to prepare for this battle. My defeat is impossible. Yours, inevitable.
[RAIDEN VS GERAS]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I will suffer you no more.
[He's wrapping Geras in a chain.]

Speaker: Geras
Text: Drowning cannot kill me, Raiden.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: That is unfortunate for you. The Sea of Blood is bottomless. You will fall forever.
[Frost joins the fun.]

Speaker: Frost
Text: Now do I have your attention, Raiden? The warriors sinking your fleet are under my command.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: You have made a devil’s bargain with Kronika, Frost.

Speaker: Frost
Text: You ignored me my entire life. Kronika saw my talent from the start.
[RAIDEN VS FROST]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Envy and ambition consume you.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Such wasted potential.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: The good she could have done, in command of these Cyber Lin Kuei.

Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: She commands them? Not Sektor? If so, she is linked to them. They follow her thoughts.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Then let them follow her to defeat.
[Raiden uses electricity to control Frost's brain. All the cyborgs are shut down.]

Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: Candy ass bitch.
[Meanwhile Resurrected Liu Kang consumes Young Liu Kang’s soul. Young Liu Kang dies.]

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: Raiden’s fleet nears our shores.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: The two of you will command the army defending the beachhead.

Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: Where will you be?
[He smiles. Kharon's ships have almost reached the land.]

Speaker: Kharon
Text: LAND HO!
[Resurrected Liu Kang is coming to the ship. He is met by Raiden.]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Time after time, Kronika’s schemes have pitted us against each other. That cycle must end, Liu Kang.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: This time, it will.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: Your power! Is this Kronika’s gift?

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: A gift to myself, you could say.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: You stole your own soul Perverted your own nature!

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: It’s a lesson you taught me, Raiden. To fight my enemies by any means necessary.
[RAIDEN VS RESURRECTED LIU KANG]

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I have conquered the darkness within me. You must do the same.

Speaker: Resurrected Liu Kang
Text: Raiden! You will have to kill me.

Speaker: Raiden
Text: I would rather save you.

[He strikes him with powerful electricity. Young Liu Kang revives and realizes what Raiden is doing, thus teleport to the last location where Raiden and Resurrected were via lightning. Kronika seems shocked.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [Young Liu Kang has become a fire-electric creature.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Sub-Zero
Text: Liu Kang?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: I am – and I am not.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: What happened to Raiden?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: He is part of me. Bound to my soul. He made me a god. For now, at least.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kitana
Text: A god? Incredible.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Now he’s out of her league.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: My Revenant counterpart. I have absorbed his knowledge of the Keep, of Kronika’s plan. I know where to find the Hourglass. We can beat Kronika.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Out of desperation comes invention. I had not thought it possible for Raiden to surprise me. Our success is no longer certain. We must make haste.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kharon
Text: Brace for impact!

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [They land on the island of Kronika and start fighting countless demons. Old Jax also helps in the fight.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Jacqui Briggs
Text: This mean you’re back?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Jax Briggs
Text: This means I’m sorry, Jacqui. And hell yeah I’m back.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [The Fire God appears in the sky and crushes all the demons in one apocalyptic explosion.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Stand back.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [They're continuing their triumphant march to Kronika's chambers.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Resurrected Jade
Text: Is the battle lost?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Victory is still at hand. The Hourglass is nearly ready. You will prevent Liu Kang’s interference. But you will require more assistance.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [She uses some kind of frost magic. Meanwhile, The Fire God and his friends stands at the door.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Whatever happens, I am honored to fight at your Side.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kitana
Text: Likewise, Liu Kang.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kung Lao
Text: Me too, brother.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: May the Elder Gods protect us.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [He melts the door and they enter the room.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Liu Kang, God of Thunder and Fire. Combining with Raiden has the benefit of novelty. But it is also too little, too late.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [The time stops… and starts to go backwards.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Kitana! Kung Lao!

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Raiden’s gift shields you from the power of the Hourglass. Regardless --Your allies are gone, while mine remain to defend me. Finish him.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [The Fire God fights the resurrected trio.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Earthrealm’s Jinsei flows within you. Let it fuel your fire.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [The Fire God does flame on and push the resurrected away.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Now stand down. I have no wish to harm you.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Resurrected Kitana
Text: Harm me?! You already killed me! My fate was sealed the moment I joined you at Raiden’s side. It s a mistake I won’t repeat in the New Era.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [FIRE GOD LIU KANG VS RESURRECTED KITANA]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Our bond was no mistake.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Resurrected Kung Lao
Text: Your ego knows no bounds.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: I did not ask for this. It was thrust upon me.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Resurrected Kung Lao
Text: It should have been me, Liu Kang, from the beginning! Thanks to Kronika, it will be.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [FIRE GOD LIU KANG VS RESURRECTED KUNG LAO]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Still, you are alive.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Yes, Kronika. You were right to fear mine and Raiden’s powers combined.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: A demi-god’s power cannot rival that of an Elder God Cetrion!

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: As you wish, mother. You match me step for step.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [Fire God Liu Kang easily defeats Cetrion.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Because your heart is not in the battle, Cetrion. You fight for your mother’s vision. But as a goddess of virtue you know that her desired balance is folly.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Heed me, Cetrion. He lacks our vision and wisdom.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Please. No virtue is served by condemning the realms to endless war.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: The greatest virtue is abiding my mother’s will, Liu Kang. I cannot fail her.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [FIRE GOD LIU KANG VS CETRION]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Your heart betrays you, Cetrion.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: I have failed you.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Dearest Cetrion, you have done admirably. Yet there is one final service to perform.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Cetrion
Text: Yes, mother. I understand.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [She kills herself and Kronika absorbs her power.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: You will be exalted in the New Era, Cetrion. And you Liu Kang, have failed. History rewinds, giving way to the New Era! The realms as you knew them are undone. Erased. You cannot save a future that no longer exists! There is only the New Era!

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [FIRE GOD LIU KANG VS KRONIKA]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: The realms will not fight your endless wars.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kronika
Text: Fight me further, and your friends are lost. They have no future unless I create it.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: The future you offer is not worth living. It will not come to pass.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [FIRE GOD LIU KANG VS KRONIKA]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [After second win Fire God Liu Kang turns Kronika into a crystal and smashes it.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Our work is finished, Liu Kang.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Lord Raiden.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: I am merely Raiden, now. You have proven worthy to take my place as Earthrealm’s new Protector, Lord Liu Kang.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Where do we go from here?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: The Sands of Time are yours to shape. You must return the Hourglass to the dawn of time and sculpt a new history. A better one.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: The fate of all realms in my hands? Raiden, I cannot do this alone.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Yes. You will need a partner with whom you can share the eons.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Kitana.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Your destinies have always been intertwined.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: We are far in the past, but not so far that I cannot reach her.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Raiden
Text: Return with her to the dawn of time. Sculpt the Hourglass’ sands to forge a better future. I look forward to meeting again, in the next timeline.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Then I will not say goodbye.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Text: [And he starts... creating.]

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Are you ready?

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Kitana
Text: Yes. But no matter how we sculpt the Sands, we cannot plan for every possibility. Mortals will make their own choices. New evils will arise.

Chapter: END OF AN ERA / FIRE GOD LIU KANG
Speaker: Fire God Liu Kang
Text: Each realm must choose its own destiny. Whatever those choices, we will face them together.
